name: FASTFOOD CYBERPUNK
description:
You're an overworked underpaid temp worker in a future fastfood joint!

Where fast is the priority and satisfaction must be guaranteed. Use your unsteady hands, Push those button, Get the customer what they want. 

  • [W+A] | [W+S] | [W+D] : ORDER TYPE COMMAND
  • [ENTER] : QUEUE UP YOUR COMMAND
  • [Q] : DELIVER THE GOODS
  • [E] : CANCEL QUEUE

This entry is a prototype build in Cyberpunk Jam 2019.
